subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The addition of Reggie Evans, a 32-year-old forward with a gleeful nasty streak who is averaging 8.1 rebounds in 19.5 minutes a game, has helped the Nets develop an attitude.
snippet: The addition of Reggie Evans, a 32-year-old forward with a gleeful nasty streak who is averaging 8.1 rebounds in 19.5 minutes a game, has helped the Nets develop an attitude.
